In 2013, [ZEIT ONLINE](http://www.zeit.de/serie/wahlistik) and the [Statistical Consulting Unit](http://www.stablab.stat.uni-muenchen.de/index.html) developed
a method to calculate coalition probabilities for the German general election.

For the the general election 2017 #BTW17, we additionally provide a
[shiny app](http://koala.stat.uni-muenchen.de/) with up to date probabilities based on the most current surveys
